name: Training and Employment
description: Toolworks specially assists low-income or homeless people with disabilities by offering the following training and employment services: - Job placement and support - Group employment and internship opportunities - Job training How to Apply: - Email: info@toolworks.org. Open Hours: - Monday to Friday: 8:30AM to 4:30PM Service Contact Information: - Email: info@toolworks.org
